gfs_server_address.name: GFS Server
gfs_server_address.description: The address for the Giraffe Flight Software socket. The web server will use this to communicate while on the ground.

gfs_update_interval_ms.name: GFS Update Interval (ms)
gfs_update_interval_ms.description: The interval at which the web server will request updates from the Flight Software.

influx_server_address.name: Influx Server
influx_server_address.description: The address for the InfluxDB server.

influx_database.name: Influx Database
influx_database.description: The name of the InfluxDB database to use.

made_up_data.name: Made Up Data
made_up_data.description: This is a made up data point.

made_up_data_2.name: Made Up Data 2
made_up_data_2.description: This is another made up data point.
